alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Natrona and southeastern Johnson Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 458 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just south of Midwest and Edgerton moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 25 to 35 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized heavy rain reducing visibility and creating ponding of water on roadways. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Midwest and Edgerton around 515 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 214 and 234. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County
